00025 #ifndef INCLUDE_git_tag_h__
00026 #define INCLUDE_git_tag_h__
00027 
00028 #include "common.h"
00029 #include "types.h"
00030 #include "oid.h"
00031 #include "object.h"
00032 
00033 /**
00034  * @file git2/tag.h
00035  * @brief Git tag parsing routines
00036  * @defgroup git_tag Git tag management
00037  * @ingroup Git
00038  * @{
00039  */
00040 GIT_BEGIN_DECL
00041 
00042 /**
00043  * Lookup a tag object from the repository.
00044  * The generated tag object is owned by the revision
00045  * repo and shall not be freed by the user.
00046  *
00047  * @param tag pointer to the looked up tag
00048  * @param repo the repo to use when locating the tag.
00049  * @param id identity of the tag to locate.
00050  * @return 0 on success; error code otherwise
00051  */
00052 GIT_INLINE(int) git_tag_lookup(git_tag **tag, git_repository *repo, const git_oid *id)
00053 {
00054         return git_object_lookup((git_object **)tag, repo, id, (git_otype)GIT_OBJ_TAG);
00055 }
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * Create a new in-memory git_tag.
00059  *
00060  * The tag object must be manually filled using
00061  * setter methods before it can be written to its
00062  * repository.
00063  *
00064  * @param tag pointer to the new tag
00065  * @param repo The repository where the object will reside
00066  * @return 0 on success; error code otherwise
00067  */
00068 GIT_INLINE(int) git_tag_new(git_tag **tag, git_repository *repo)
00069 {
00070         return git_object_new((git_object **)tag, repo, (git_otype)GIT_OBJ_TAG);
00071 }
00072 
00073 /**
00074  * Get the id of a tag.
00075  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00076  * @return object identity for the tag.
00077  */
00078 GIT_EXTERN(const git_oid *) git_tag_id(git_tag *tag);
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * Get the tagged object of a tag
00082  * @param target pointer where to store the target
00083  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00084  * @return 0 on success; error code otherwise
00085  */
00086 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tag_target(git_object **target, git_tag *t);
00087 
00088 /**
00089  * Get the OID of the tagged object of a tag
00090  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00091  * @return pointer to the OID
00092  */
00093 GIT_EXTERN(const git_oid *) git_tag_target_oid(git_tag *t);
00094 
00095 /**
00096  * Get the type of a tag's tagged object
00097  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00098  * @return type of the tagged object
00099  */
00100 GIT_EXTERN(git_otype) git_tag_type(git_tag *t);
00101 
00102 /**
00103  * Get the name of a tag
00104  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00105  * @return name of the tag
00106  */
00107 GIT_EXTERN(const char *) git_tag_name(git_tag *t);
00108 
00109 /**
00110  * Get the tagger (author) of a tag
00111  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00112  * @return reference to the tag's author
00113  */
00114 GIT_EXTERN(const git_signature *) git_tag_tagger(git_tag *t);
00115 
00116 /**
00117  * Get the message of a tag
00118  * @param tag a previously loaded tag.
00119  * @return message of the tag
00120  */
00121 GIT_EXTERN(const char *) git_tag_message(git_tag *t);
00122 
00123 /**
00124  * Set the target of a tag (i.e. the object that the tag points to)
00125  * @param tag The tag to modify
00126  * @param target the new tagged target
00127  */
00128 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tag_set_target(git_tag *tag, git_object *target);
00129 
00130 /**
00131  * Set the name of a tag
00132  * @param tag The tag to modify
00133  * @param name the new name for the tag
00134  */
00135 GIT_EXTERN(void) git_tag_set_name(git_tag *tag, const char *name);
00136 
00137 /**
00138  * Set the tagger of a tag
00139  * @param tag The tag to modify
00140  * @param tagger_sig signature of the tagging action
00141  * @return 0 on success; error code otherwise
00142  */
00143 GIT_EXTERN(void) git_tag_set_tagger(git_tag *tag, const git_signature *tagger_sig);
00144 
00145 /**
00146  * Set the message of a tag
00147  * @param tag The tag to modify
00148  * @param message the new tagger for the tag
00149  */
00150 GIT_EXTERN(void) git_tag_set_message(git_tag *tag, const char *message);
00151 
00152 /** @} */
00153 GIT_END_DECL
00154 #endif
